effect.short: Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Silences the target for two turns, preventing it from using any sound-based moves.

flavorTexts.text:
The user attacks the target’s throat, and the
resultant suffering prevents the target from using
moves that emit sound for two turns.
